vatternrundan.tagline: The world's largest recreational cycling event with over 20,000 participants

meta.title: V√§tternrundan - Plan Your Race | Race Planner
meta.description: Complete guide for V√§tternrundan. Plan your strategy, calculate times and pace for 315km around Lake V√§ttern. Free tools and tips.

hero.title: Plan V√§tternrundan
hero.subtitle: 315, 150 or 100 km around Sweden's most beautiful lake - do your best with proper planning

about.title: About V√§tternrundan 315
about.description: V√§tternrundan is the world's largest recreational cycling event with over 20,000 participants each year. The race covers 315 km around Lake V√§ttern and has been a classic since 1966.

feature1.title: Calculate Your Time
feature1.description: Calculate what average speed you need to maintain to reach your time goal

feature2.title: Plan Feed Stops
feature2.description: Add planned stops at control stations and calculate arrival times

feature3.title: Visualize the Route
feature3.description: See the entire 315 km route on a map with elevation profile and control stations

tip1.title: Start Easy
tip1.description: The first kilometers don't decide the outcome - save energy for the last part. Many hit the wall because they start too fast.

tip2.title: Eat and Drink Regularly
tip2.description: Plan for at least 2-3 feed stops and refuel continuously during the race.

tip3.title: Train on Long Rides
tip3.description: Build endurance with at least one ride over 160 km before the race to be prepared.

cta.title: Ready to Plan Your Race?
cta.description: Create your personal plan for V√§tternrundan for free with Race Planner

meta.title: Guide: Plan for V√§tternrundan 2026 | Race Planner
meta.description: Complete planning guide for V√§tternrundan. Learn how to plan pace, feed stops and strategy for 315km. Tips from experienced cyclists.

hero.title: V√§tternrundan Planning Guide
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know to plan and complete your best V√§tternrundan

preparation.title: Preparations for V√§tternrundan
preparation.intro: V√§tternrundan requires good preparation. Here's what you need to consider.
preparation.content: Start your training at least 3-4 months before the race. Gradually increase the distance on your long rides and include at least one ride over 150 km. Test all equipment during training - bike, clothing, saddle and nutrition. Nothing should be new on race day.

pacing.title: Pacing and Strategies
pacing.intro: The right pace determines whether you reach the finish with energy left or hit the wall.
pacing.content: Start slower than planned. The first 60-70 km feel easy but save important energy. Maintain a steady pace and avoid hanging on to fast groups early. Use our planning tool to calculate your optimal average speed based on your time goal.

nutrition.title: Food and Drink During the Race
nutrition.intro: 315 km requires planned energy intake. Here's how to do it.
nutrition.content: Eat and drink before you get hungry or thirsty. Aim for 60-90g of carbohydrates per hour and at least 500-750ml of fluid. Plan your feed stops in advance and take the opportunity to eat real food - bananas, sandwiches and fruit provide energy. Supplement with gels and sports drinks between feed zones.

equipment.title: Equipment and Packing
equipment.intro: The right equipment makes a difference in a 315 km race.
equipment.content: Choose comfortable clothing in multiple layers - it can get cold at night. Pack spare tubes, pump and basic tools. Bring extra lighting and warm gloves. Test everything on long training rides so you know it works.

recovery.title: After the Race - Recovery
recovery.intro: Proper recovery is important after such a long race.
recovery.content: Eat and drink immediately after finishing. Stretch gently and move lightly during recovery days. Let your body rest for at least a week before training hard again. Listen to your body and give yourself time to recover.

meta.title: Checklist for V√§tternrundan | Race Planner
meta.description: Complete checklist for those riding V√§tternrundan. Everything you need to pack, plan and prepare for the race.

months.title: 3-6 months Before
items: Plan training program with long rides over 150 km, you want to do atleast 1000 km before V√§tternrundan
Book accommodation in Motala if traveling far
Check if bike needs servicing and book a bike service if needed, you will not be the only one the closer it gets
Create your time plan with Race Planner
Test all your equipment on long training rides
Try different types of sports nutrition to see which one suits you the best

month.title: 1-2 month Before
items: Make sure to do a real long ride (min 160 km)
Check or if you haven't already, Service bike - brakes, gears, chain
Check tire condition and replace if needed
Test all equipment one last time

day.title: Day before + Race Day
items: Eat substantial breakfast 3-4 hours before start
Fill water bottles and pack nutrition
Arrive at start in good time

gear.title: Packing List - Equipment
items: Cycling jersey and extra layer for night

nutrition.title: Packing List - Food & Drinks
items: Possibly caffeine gel for final stretch

tools.title: Packing List - Tools & Spare Parts
items: Mobile phone and possibly power bank
